fa-progress/gapDegree (type=circle).description: the gap degree of half circle, 0 ~ 360

fa-progress/gapPosition (type=circle).description: the gap position, options: top bottom left right

fa-progress/showInfo.description: whether to display the progress value and the status icon

fa-progress/status.description: to set the status of the Progress, options: normal success exception active

fa-progress/strokeWidth (type=line).description: to set the width of the progress bar, unit: px

fa-progress/strokeWidth (type=circle).description: to set the width of the circular progress bar, unit: percentage of the canvas width

fa-progress/strokeLinecap.description: to set the style of the progress linecap

fa-progress/successPercent.description: segmented success percent, works when type="line"

fa-progress/type.description: to set the type, options: line circle dashboard

fa-progress/width (type=circle).description: to set the canvas width of the circular progress bar, unit: px
